description: Prior Approval for Demolition of 5no. existing residential buildings within the Grange Farm Estate, South Harrow: 1-9 Wesley Close, 10-18 Wesley Close, 82-90 Grange Farm Close, 64-72 Grange Farm Close, 46-54 Grange Farm Close.
decision_conditions: No demolition or site works shall commence until an Asbestos Register Report have been submitted to and approve in writing by the Local planning Authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the details so agreed. Should any unforeseen asbestos be found on the site its handling and disposal must be carried out in accordance with the Control of Asbestos Regulations 2012 and guidance provided by the HSE - https://www.hse.gov.uk/asbestos/index.htmREASON: To ensure that all asbestos works are carried out suitably in relation to adjoining properties in the interests of the amenity of neighbouring residents, the appearance of the development and public safety.

<p>The demolition works shall be carried out in accordance with the following details submitted with application:&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">Proposed Method Statement and Risk Assessments dated 20</span><sup style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">th</sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> November 2024 issue 03, Drw No: GFE-PTE-ZZ-XX-DR-A-99013 (Site Location Plan), Cover letter dated 29 November by Stantec, Site Notice dated 8</span><sup style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">th</sup><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;"> January 2025, Photographs of site notice and the approved details under condition 2</span>, unless otherwise agreed in writing with the local planning authority</p><p>REASON: To ensure that all works are carried out suitably in relation to adjoining properties in the interests of the amenity of neighbouring residents, the appearance of the development and public safety.</p>
